title: Non-Responsive Client

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Um, I don't know if its my computer or the client, but I was playing some matches and this never happened until now and now I have queue timers. I just wanna know if I have to wait these queue timers or not.

replies.body: It definitely looks like your pc had some sort of bad interaction while League was running. It might have been some kind of driver issue, but let's run through all the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to make sure we cover all of our bases. I won't be able to help with the Q timers sadly, since you ended up with this LPQ based on your past afk/leaves.
Thanks for the information, I already fixed the problem by restarting my pc.  Thanks for the help though.
